description: The keg is a versatile, temperature-controlled environment designed to brew and ferment. With it, you can make anything from kimchi to beers, brews, and even cheese.
The keg requires four things to function:
Time: fermentation takes a considerable amount of time to occur.
Temperature: An indicated temperature requirement can be seen for recipes, this is affected by the amount of magma/ice blocks surrounding the keg respectively.
A base: in the single slot is the keg's base, not always necessarily a tankard.
Ingredients: the requirements for the brew.
